detail_desc: 5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
All-in-one suit in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems, and press-studs on one shoulder, at the crotch and down the legs. Soft brushed inside.
Short dress in a softly draping viscose weave. Opening with a covered button at the back of the neck, an elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Unlined.

Set with a T-shirt and cycling shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey. Straight-cut T-shirt with an embroidered motif at the top and a ribbed trim around the neckline. Cycling shorts with an elasticated waist.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems. Lined in patterned jersey.
Skinny-fit dungarees in washed, stretch denim with adjustable straps, a high waist, zip in one side, chest pocket, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Ankle-length chinos in soft twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, a welt back pocket with a button and a detachable braided imitation leather belt.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Calf-length jumpsuit in stretch cotton twill with a collar, metal press-studs at the front and seam at the waist. Low crotch, side pockets, patch back pockets and flared legs with a slit at the hems.

Single-breasted jacket in dobby-weave wool with narrow notch lapels with a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, patch front pockets and two inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Relaxed fit with good room for movement over the shoulders, chest and waist to create a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.
Gently fitted jacket in a textured weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front, welt front pockets and sleeves with gathered seams. Lined.
Calf-length skirt in a softly draping weave with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Trousers in soft viscose jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and wide, tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Polo-neck top in a soft, brushed viscose blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Trainers in imitation suede with imitation leather details, lacing at the front, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with a flounce at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, one with a small decoration.

Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with an embroidered and reversible-sequined motif on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins), ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Longer mesh layer at the hem.
Short top in soft organic cotton jersey with dropped shoulders and short flounced sleeves.
Imitation leather shoulder bag with a braided front and zip at the top. Imitation leather and metal chain shoulder strap. Partly lined. Size 6x13x19 cm.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with sweatshirt fabric sleeves, a small stand-up collar and a lined, detachable hood with a hook and loop fastening. Zip down the front, discreet side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined. Polyester filling.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams. Detachable hood, a zip down the front with a chin guard, a zipped chest pocket, welt front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Waist belt in imitation suede with elastic at the back and a metal buckle decorated with sparkly glass stones at the front. Width 3 cm.
Shorts in an organic cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Double-layered jersey hairband with a knot-detail at the front.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Lined hood, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and no buttons.
Top in slub jersey made from a viscose and linen blend with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and buttons down the front.
Cap in cotton with a small embroidered text detail at one side and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Slim-fit, high-waisted, calf-length jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets, and straight-cut hems with short slits in the sides.

Straight shirt jacket in soft fabric with a collar and press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, front pockets, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and cuffs with a press stud. Unlined.
Metal and plastic earrings. Diameter 3 cm.
Tights in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.

5-pocket shorts in washed cotton denim with worn details. Relaxed fit with a regular waist, zip fly and button and gently tapered legs that finish just below the knees. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Short, straight-cut coat in woven fabric with a zip down the front and zipped pockets with a decorative flap. Lined.
Trousers in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with a regular waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and slim legs. Embroidery around the waistband and at the hems.
Fully lined swimsuit with frill-trimmed shoulder straps, frills at the top and a seam at the waist.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover funnel collar and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Sleeveless blouse in an airy cotton weave with a frill-trimmed grandad collar and bib front with a button placket and pin-tucks. Gathered yoke at the back, narrow, detachable ties under the bust and a rounded hem.

Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck. V-neck at the front and seam with decorative gathers at the top, and short, wide puff sleeves with drawstring hems.
Long-sleeved top in jersey with a print motif. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Ankle-length trousers in sturdy cotton jersey. High waist with pleats, a zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening, and tapered legs with a slit at the front.
Jersey-lined joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, a back pocket, side pockets and tapered legs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and ties at the sides.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft fine knit with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a zip down the front and along one leg, long sleeves and full feet.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved top in jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Short jumper in a soft knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, wide dress in a soft viscose weave with a V-neck, 3/4-length sleeves and a seam with pleats at the waist. Unlined.
Short top in soft, printed jersey with short sleeves and ties at the hem.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and print motif.
Rib-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.
Calf-length skirt in pleated satin with a high, elasticated waist and drawstring with tassels at the ends. Unlined.
Long-sleeved shirt in airy cotton poplin with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and buttoned cuffs.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.

Short, fitted pencil skirt in woven fabric with a high waist, narrow, detachable belt and a concealed zip at the back. Lined. The polyester content of the outer fabric is partly recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.
Shorts in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with wide, covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, pockets in the side seams, a back pocket and raw-edge hems.
Gently fitted blouse in woven fabric with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Off-the-shoulder top in a viscose weave with smocking at the top and long raglan sleeves. Narrow elastication and a wide flounce at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Cardigan in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and concealed pockets in the side seams. No buttons.

Short kaftan dress woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend containing some linen. Double stand-up collar with a V-shaped opening and drawstrings at the front and long, wide raglan sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Asymmetric seam at the waist with covered elastication at the back and drawstrings at the front. Lined in a cotton weave.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Scarf in a cotton and linen jacquard weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 50x180 cm.

Shirt in premium cotton Oxford with a button-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Oversized jacket in textured jersey made from a cotton blend with a small stand-up collar, concealed press-studs down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with pleats and a decorative tab at the cuffs. Patch front pockets with a flap and a decorative flap chest pocket. Jersey lining.
Lined triangle bikini top with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a metal fastener at the back.
Hat in soft garter-stitched cotton with a ribbed hem.
Double-layered headband knitted in soft merino wool with a knot detail at the front.
Lined chinos in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, and a fake welt pocket with a decorative button at the back.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide waist belt in imitation leather with elastic and a metal fastener at the back. Double layered with a narrower strap in imitation suede that is knotted at the front. Width 4 cm.
Cardigan in quilted jersey with a zip down the front, small stand-up collar with a press-stud, welt front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shorts in woven fabric with hook-and-eye fasteners, a zip fly and side pockets. High waist with pleats at the front, elastication at the back and a detachable tie belt.
Blouse in a gently crinkled viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and short slits in the sides.

Super push-up lace bra with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.

V-neck playsuit in airy plumeti chiffon crêpe with scalloped edges. Wrapover top with a concealed press-stud at the front, long sleeves with an opening and narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a concealed zip in one side. Elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, and short, wide legs. Partly lined.
Sports vest top in burnout-patterned, fast-drying functional fabric with sheer sections. Loose fit.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Straight-cut, long-sleeved shirt jacket in a washed, organic cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a visible seam down the back. Chest pocket, patch front pockets and a straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides.
Shopper in soft suede with handles and a magnetic fastener at the top, a narrow, detachable shoulder strap and large outer compartment. Unlined. Size 13x35x38 cm.
